long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gmail and some other email service support using 'yourname+something@gmail.com' email formats. Sou you can have as many email addresses as many you want. 
Using these addresses at registrations can help you separate who is sending you spam or who sold your email to spammers because they will use this unique address in the TO filed.
My extension generates a unique email address from the domain of the website you are currently visiting so you can see who is responsible spamming you.
